subject: JUnit doesn't run outside of Visual Age for Java
msgSnippet: Hello, I have a question or more of a problem. Does JUnit run outside of Visual Age for Java? It runs perfectly in my VAJava, but when I export it and run in
messageBody:
Hello,

I have a question or more of a problem.
Does JUnit run outside of Visual Age for Java?

It runs perfectly in my VAJava, but when I export it and run in
command prompt, it doesn't run. After days of debugging I've finally
pin-pointed the problem. It's because the method inVAJava() throws a
LinkageError (Throwable) upon executing this line:
Class.forName("com.ibm.uvm.tools.DebugSupport"); and therefore
doesn't return true, which makes the application stall. How do I know
for sure that it doesn't stall because of a different problem? Well,
if I comment out that line inVAJava() returns true, and continues to
execute normally outside of VAJ. However, my goal is to have it
running without making any changes to the JUnit.

BTW, I'm using sdk 1.2

Thanks, your answer will be much appreciated
